title: The Gathering Place
content:
I need help identifying the font on this. The lowercase r is throwing me for a loop.

Font: 

 Multima Strong

comments.content: **[Multima Strong](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317121237/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-5%20%2F%20%28Freemium%29&ffam=Multima%20Strong%20-%20Regular&fid=bb601cc9493c042c1ffb0b13ea8a3831&fsize=60&text=THE%20GATHERING&wrap=2)** by Kiril Zlatkov [2012, Free for personal use]
